lead_paragraph: Banned European soccer boss president Michel Platini has withdrawn his candidacy from the race for the presidency of soccer's scandal-plagued governing body FIFA, he told French sports daily L'Equipe on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Platini Withdraws Candidacy for FIFA Presidency
headline.main: Platini Withdraws Candidacy for FIFA Presidency

snippet: Banned European soccer boss president Michel Platini has withdrawn his candidacy from the race for the presidency of soccer's scandal-plagued governing body FIFA, he told French sports daily L'Equipe on Thursday....
